data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 1,894 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Dinagat Islands.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Dinagat Islands, Philippines
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Dinagat Islands to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the state of Dinagat Islands access to a Bible in their own language.
Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 1,894 believers in the state of Dinagat Islands.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Maguindanao people.
Father, help the 1,894 believers in Dinagat Islands to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 11,706 lost friends and neighbors.
the state of Dinagat Islands has (about) 1,894 people who know Jesus, 10,477 people who know about him culturally, and 1,229 people who are far from Jesus.

data.section_summary:
the state of Dinagat Islands, Philippines has a population of 13,600.

We estimate Dinagat Islands has 1,894 people who might know Jesus, 10,477 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,229 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 7 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the state of Dinagat Islands prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.
